entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
